ThingDef.AIRobot_Custom_BuilderBot.label: Builder Bot
ThingDef.AIRobot_Custom_BuilderBot.description: A Tier 1 amateur-class unit capable of constructing, deconstructing, repairing, and mining.
ThingDef.RPP_Bot_Builder_Interm.label: Builder Bot
ThingDef.RPP_Bot_Builder_Interm.description: A Tier 2 professional-class unit capable of constructing, deconstructing, repairing, and mining.
ThingDef.RPP_Bot_Builder_Adv.label: Builder Bot
ThingDef.RPP_Bot_Builder_Adv.description: A Tier 3 Master-class unit capable of constructing, deconstructing, repairing, and mining.
ThingDef.AIRobot_Custom_CrafterBot.label: Crafter Bot
ThingDef.AIRobot_Custom_CrafterBot.description: A Tier 1 amateur-class unit capable of smithing, tailoring, and crafting.
ThingDef.RPP_Bot_Crafter_Interm.label: Crafter Bot
ThingDef.RPP_Bot_Crafter_Interm.description: A Tier 2 professional-class unit capable of smithing, tailoring, and crafting.
ThingDef.RPP_Bot_Crafter_Adv.label: Crafter Bot
ThingDef.RPP_Bot_Crafter_Adv.description: A Tier 3 Master-class unit capable of smithing, tailoring, and crafting.
ThingDef.AIRobot_Custom_ERBot.label: ER Bot
ThingDef.AIRobot_Custom_ERBot.description: A Tier 1 amateur-class Emergency Response unit capable of treating patients and fighting fires.
ThingDef.RPP_Bot_ER_Interm.label: ER Bot
ThingDef.RPP_Bot_ER_Interm.description: A Tier 2 professional-class Emergency Response unit capable of treating patients and fighting fires.
ThingDef.RPP_Bot_ER_Adv.label: ER Bot
ThingDef.RPP_Bot_ER_Adv.description: A Tier 3 Master-class Emergency Response unit capable of treating patients and fighting fires.
ThingDef.AIRobot_Custom_KitchenBot.label: Kitchen Bot
ThingDef.AIRobot_Custom_KitchenBot.description: A Tier 1 amateur-class unit capable of cooking, and tending to plants.
ThingDef.RPP_Bot_Kitchen_Interm.label: Kitchen Bot
ThingDef.RPP_Bot_Kitchen_Interm.description: A Tier 2 professional-class unit capable of cooking, and tending to plants.
ThingDef.RPP_Bot_Kitchen_Adv.label: Kitchen Bot
